name: Dance
tagline: Experience the thrill of the dance floor at our fest event.
knowmore: Details of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events.

knowmoreList.description: Can You Du-'et? : Be So Good They Can't Ignore You, is a duo western dance competition where we challenge you to make the audience dance to your beats!

Battle Troupe: Connect with your passion and burn up the dance floor with your Troupe, is a western group dance competition where the dance societies of delhi compete with each other with their choreography, rhythm and synchronization.

Thematic is a group dance event where a social concern is addressed with dance. There are no particular themes for this event. Teams can perform on any theme they want. Mostly, we expect choreography societies of colleges to participate in this event.

Group Dance event, teams of 10-20 people would be required to perform any of the street dance styles: Hip Hop, Popping, Tutting, Krumping, Bboying, Stepping, Break Dance, Contraptions and Western Freestyle
Verve: We Only Speak In Dance, is a solo dance competition with only western styles like Hip-Hop, Bboying, Jazz, Contemporary, etc., allowed where you can showcase your verve for dance.

name: Finance
tagline: Experience the thrill of the dance floor at our fest event.
knowmore: Details of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events.

knowmoreList.description: A thrilling treasure hunt combined with the bulls and bears of the Stock Market. The participants would decode clues and find hints related to stock. They would then use the information to predict stock behavior and invest accordingly. There would be three rounds, and the teams with the most profit will win!

Financial Bluff will be an event where teams try to fool each other with numbers, prompting them to guess if a statement is factually wrong or does it just sound wrong. The event will have special-company rounds concentrating on facts regarding a particular company, leading the participants to research it to win bonus points. Popular finance platforms are to be used to check the correctness of the facts.
description

Decode the mysteries of the rival CEO, to crack open his laptop and documents.... Enter the case of the Dead CEO, and uncover his biggest business secrets. Welcome to Raaz Mystery Rooms, a place where you are expected to uncover corporate secrets using your business acumen

A game of luck, skill and strategy. The game is in the name. Mock Stock allows the participants to show their knack for the stock market and its workings. The participants will be given a virtual sum of money which they have to invest in a certain list of companies provided by us while navigating through a lot of information, analytics and news articles given to them.

Critical Bid is  an event consisting of two rounds where, the first round is a auction and the second round is a trading round. This event showcases your ability to observe what the market situations are and how to use collaboration across agencies to your advantage.

name: Culinary
tagline: Experience the thrill of the dance floor at our fest event.
knowmore: Details of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events.

knowmoreList.description: Is the foodie inside you craving???Compete with hundered's of these type of foodies to get a chance to play replica of the famous family feud show of Steve Harvey!! Get a chance to win enormous food hampers and prizes along with delecious cusinies in offer with great companionship!!!
Dare 2 Eat ?? We bring to you a fun food eating challenge where you munch on delicious, tasty foods and participate in some crazy challenges to win Exciting Prizes. COME, EAT and WIN.

name: Fun
tagline: Experience the thrill of the dance floor at our fest event.
knowmore: Details of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events.

knowmoreList.description: 'Looking for love or just a fun night out? Come check out our blind date event at the college fest! You never know who you'll meet and the possibilities are endless. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to connect with someone new. Sign up now for a chance to find your match!'

Casino Carnival, is aimed at a fun casino-themed setup. It is divided into three major rounds - The first round consisting of myriad casino-related games like blackjack, roulette, andar bahar etc; the second being a teen patti round involving all the remaining participants; and the third and final one being an all-in jackpot round where participants would receive the chance to test their luck and possibly turn around their very fate!
description

Minute is the jury of fast and fury'. This is a set of events for all the participants where they can play party games like Beer Pong, Darts, Bottle Flip, Ring Toss and Speed Eraser. With their raging energy and enthusiasm they have to complete it in a minute or as we call it “Win it in a minute” and win exciting prizes and rewards.

If stocks and stories buzz you ,you've come to right place . An interesting event focussing on bidding  on various marvel characters through an engaging story and winning exciting prizes and merch from our side

The cooking competition 'The Battle of Chefs' not only requires hard work, but also showcases cooks who put their all into the dish and express their own unique culinary tastes as well as those of food lovers.

Each college competes by showing off their fashion sense and grace. Walk a catwalk wearing your line and let your clothes tell us why you deserve to win
Trashion is fashion but with thrown-out, found, and repurposed elements, basically trash. Simply, it is making Haute Couture from everyday trash!

knowmoreList.description: The event is aimed to have relevant discussions on topics that are extremely important but are still not talked about enough. The event will have total of 2 rounds
It is the debate event that you have been looking for with exciting and challenging motions.Instead of the monotonous debate format, we have something novel, yet unique and fun!

A classic Debate Competition to battle it out with the fastest thinkers. Exciting Prizes in multiple categories for the winners are just the cherry on top with a networking opportunity with the best minds.
Unmute: Open Mic Poetry Event gives a golden opportunity to spoken word artists, both beginners and seasoned, to sweep the audience off their feet by the power of their words, emotions and craft.

name: Quizzing
tagline: Are you ready to face off against other trivia enthusiasts? Join us!
knowmore: Details of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events of events.

knowmoreList.description: Expect anything and everything from Zomato ads to Elon Musk’s tweet references to String Theory parodies and of course, data theft. The quiz will have a little bit of everything from science, business, technology and their intersections.

Whether you’re a comic book fan, adore classical literature, are into the newer artists, jam to the old-school bands, or are a mythology buff or a major foodie, we can assure you that you’ll fit right in with in with the general quiz!
Be it about Harry Maguire defending or Will Smith’s Oscars tragedy, you should be ready for anything. This quiz invites all sorts of crowds, from e-sport gamers to Bollywood fans.

From Linkin Park to Led Zeppelin, Banksy to Botticelli, and Tarantino to Truffaut, if you feel all that time glossing over movies, weird music and literature facts was a waste of time, then this is the quiz where you put all those ‘wasted hours’ to the test.
